thread.title: US and European mayors hold summit in London hotel
thread.title_full: US and European mayors hold summit in London hotel - BBC News

author: BBC
title: US and European mayors hold summit in London hotel
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device US and European mayors hold summit in London hotel 20 October 2015 Last updated at 14:35 BST
A collection of mayors is called a "magnificence" and 30 of them have been meeting in a London hotel.
Daily Politics reporter Adam Fleming caught up with some of them at the summit, including New York's former mayor Michael Bloomberg who is being urged to run for US president.
They went on a tour of London's Crossrail site at Canary Wharf, which brought home the relative powers of UK and US mayors.
Read more Daily Politics and Sunday Politics highlights of 2015 Tax credit reforms must protect low earners, Boris Johnson says Boris Johnson knocks child to ground in touch rugby Boris Johnson: Night Tube will happen 'eventually'
